title: Cronies
subtitle: Commemorating the launch of the Cronos network
p1: Cronies are a NFT to commemorate the launch of the Cronos network. Here we will take advantage of the low gas fees on Cronos and produce a randomly generated 100% on-chain SVG with the Cronos logo and the block number in which it was minted.
p2: We are really excited to see the unique collections you will build. Such as, sequential block numbers, block numbers that have a special meaning to you like a birthday, and color schemes. The Cronies minting contract will self destruct after the 1 millionth block validated.
description: Cronies are a NFT to commemorate the launch of the Cronos network. Here we will take advantage of the low gas fees on Cronos and produce a randomly generated 100% on-chain SVG with the Cronos logo and the block number in which it was minted. We are really excited to see the unique collections you will build. Such as, sequential block numbers, block numbers that have a special meaning to you like a birthday, and color schemes. The Cronies minting contract will self destruct after the 1 millionth block validated.

title: Founding Member
subtitle: Early access to features and reduced fees forever.
p1: If you hold a Founding Member NFT you will have access to the NFT launchpad, beta features, and receive the benefit of reduced service fees.
p2: The Founding Member NFT has an on-chain referral system. Refer a friend and receive 5% of the NFT cost and they receive 5% off. Founding Member NFTs will be limited to 10,000.
description: If you hold a Founding Member NFT you will have access to the NFT launchpad, beta features, and receive the benefit of reduced service fees. The Founding Member NFT has an on-chain referral system. Refer a friend and receive 5% of the NFT cost and they receive 5% off. Founding Member NFTs will be limited to 10,000.
abi: function mint(uint256 _id, uint256 _amount, bytes _data) public payable

title: Ebisu by Barbara
subtitle: May his blessing be upon you as a guiding light in your journeys on the Cronos chain.
description: Ebisu has many origins, all of which have lead to his current status as one of the Seven Lucky Gods. Eternally grateful for the generosity and luck that had saved his life Ebisu is spreading joy and luck to all he encounters. May his blessing be upon you as a guiding light in your journeys on the Cronos Chain.

title: CROstmas Cards
subtitle: CROstmas Cards is a collection on Cronos network.
description: CROstmas Cards is a festive collection on Cronos network. You can attach any amount of CRO to your CROstmas card and send it to your friends using the link below, which they will be able to "Unwrap" and get CRO to their wallet.

title: SantaCro
subtitle: SantaCro is a collection of 5555 Santa inspired NFTs with 75+ traits, living on the Cronos chain by crypto.com.
description:
Ho, ho, ho! This year CroMoon is going to host the special Cronos Christmas, and we have a special guest: SantaCro, the Santa of the Cronos chain.
 SantaCro is a collection of 5555 Santa inspired NFTs with 75+ traits, living on the Cronos chain by crypto.com.
 SantaCro is going to bring presents to some lucky minters, on the blockchain AND in real life (yes, you heard that right!).
 Let’s make this Christmas a special one together!

title: Admiration
subtitle: Deplone is a young visual artist, who turned his life upside down to chase what he really loves. Since he discovered his passion for 3D art and motion design he has developed his own distinct style. Tries to stay humble and anonymous. Works often influenced by the events from his personal life or day-to-day reflections about the world around him.
description: This 6 piece collection was created with an intention to admire certain elements important to the creative process, but also life in general. The aim of every one of these six artworks is to make the new owner just take a small break and ponder about one of those topics, as well as admire their influence on the surrounding world. I chose the form factor of a surreal museum-like space, because ever since I was a small child, I thought about modern art galleries as the calm, quiet places designed to let the observer admire and reflect upon the odd, non-conventional and often controversial concepts. I hope that events taking place in this little space I designed in my head will succeed in their goal.

title: LazyHorse
description: The Lazy Horse Race Club connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

title: CROugars
subtitle: A limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain.
description: CROugars is a limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain. This project has a strong focus on real NFT utilities, some of which, Cronos has not yet seen. This includes NFT staking that shares royalties with holders, as well as DAO governance that allows CROugar holders to vote on proposals.

title: Cronos Fox Fraternity
description:
CFF is a 4,444 NFT collection on the Cronos Blockchain. Each NFT was created from over 122 Different Traits, like skin, headgear, body, etc. They are all good looking Bros, but some of them have special perks.

Entering the Fox Fraternity, doesn't just mean possessing a NFT. You will be part of a brotherhood and get exclusive Benefits. This include Giveaways, Airdrops, Gifts, etc.
disclaimer: Smart contract for this project was developed by the Cronos Fox Fraternity team

title: Cronos Goats
description: OG Goats is a limited collection of 1000 NFT's on the Cronos Network. Our Goats main focus is Utility for the community. We will be implementing a buy back feature where half of all the royalties go towards buying the lowest ranked Goats so we can take them off the market for a minimum of 8 years. Our OG Goats will act as a major discount ticket to our second collection of Bad Billy Goats. We will also Gift our community with physical art pieces of their NFT's! The future for these goats are endless as we plan to implement a DEX, NFT staking, P2E games, and Cronos's First NFT art Gallery.

title: Space Crystal Unicorns
subtitle: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need. All funds raised will be used to support hippotherapy classes for children with disabilities.
description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most don’t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 ‘Rare Heart Hodler’ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Additionally, 10 holders of the 'Heart Hodler' from the open edition will be randomly selected to receive a physical autographed card from myself

title: The Lazy Horse Member NFT (PONY)
description: The Lazy Horse Race Club connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

title: Crognomes
subtitle: 2000 secretive hard working Crognomes living on the cronos blockchain who might share the location of the secret mines if taken care of well enough.
description:
"Have you ever wondered where all those shiny crypto cards actually come from?

Those glistening ruby, shiny indigo & luminescent jade crystals that are needed for those ooooh so sweet cashbacks are harvested deep inside the hidden cryptomines. The location of these mines are a well-kept secret by the Crognomes... 

While they’re no tattletales, the Crognomes might share the secret location of these Cryptomines with you, if you provide them safe refuge in your cryptowallet. 

Crognomes have been known to sneak in their wives, the Crognomides, when they’re feeling lonely. So you can expect these Crognomides to show up in your wallet as well!* If you leave them alone for a long enough time, you will find your family of 2 has grown ever larger. 

Start your own Crognome-family and adopt your Crognome today!

*In order to make sure that the Crognomides find their husband in your cryptowallet in time, you will need to have minted your Crognomes NFTs BEFORE 9PM UTC on the 26th of January! All Crognome NFTs minted after that will have the option to safely usher their Crognomides into their cryptowallet by minting a safe route. 
This route can be minted for 50 CRO"

title: Fractals
subtitle: SeasaltCrisp is a passionate visual artist trying to take you on an adventure with his unique and special artworks.He discovered his love for art already in his early years, but now he's here to share his workon the Cronos Chain as well.
description: This is a limited art collection of 50 unique and original NFTs.This collection was created to explore whole new worlds and surreal scenarios.Let's turn on our imagination and explore art together!

title: Aunah
subtitle:
There’s no slowing down anytime soon.

Between his skillfully bold contemplative rendering of abstraction and realism, his paintings are visceral yet sensual.
description:
There’s no slowing down anytime soon.

Between his skillfully bold contemplative rendering of abstraction and realism, his paintings are visceral yet sensual.

Each concept is a treat, your mind skips between pops of color to moody-sophistication. Chance creates and energy with hints of density giving off a slight sculptural feel for the eye to play with.

His subjects are elevated to a new age and vibe that will constantly stimulate your mind with ever-changing narratives.

Chance Watt

title: CronoGods
subtitle: Become A God, CronoGods. 1520 CronoGods over 120 traits. Be Apart of the Journey.
description:
Become A God, CronoGods. 1520 CronoGods over 120 traits. Be Apart of the Journey.

Chance To win a trip the the U.S. Virgin Islands an meet Yako Founder of CronoGods.

Holders Get Random Loot Airdrop.

Holders have a chance to win a share of $10,000 in CRO.

15% goes toward charities in the Virgin Islands.

Have a say on your CronoGod NFT in our unique comic strip that will be mintable along huge names in cronos space. One of a kind.

We offer many more things visit https://www.cronogods.com/
erc20Abi: function allowance(address owner, address spender) external view returns (uint256)

title: Marie's Cyborgs
subtitle:
Marie's Cyborgs connects fashion and the Metaverse. We invite you to enter Marie's universe by sharing her passions: Fashion, movies and her cyborgs!
The whole team is looking forward to meeting you!
description:
Marie is a French high-potential model.
Convinced that art takes multiple forms, she now wishes to introduce her universe through her collection of NFTs and becoming one of the first model in Metaverse.
The collection will come in 3 classes based on Marie’s passions: fashion, movies (rare) and her cyborgs (legendary).
